name: docker-containers
description: List Docker containers with filtering and formatting options

examples.description: List all containers (including stopped) - alias for dps --all

options.description: Show all containers (default shows just running)
Show the latest created container (includes all states)
Show n last created containers (includes all states)
Filter output based on conditions (can be used multiple times)
Pretty-print containers using a Go template

filters: label=<key> or label=<key>=<value> - Filter by label
status=<status> - One of created, restarting, running, removing, paused, exited, dead
ancestor=<image-name> - Containers created from this image
before=<container> - Containers created before this container
since=<container> - Containers created since this container
network=<network> - Containers connected to this network
